notes:
Samael managed to switch worlds during a small ritual performed by [[Eclesius]] to help his former assistant, [[Turian]], who is now transformed into a frog. While Samael was bewildered right after entering our world, Eclesius managed to lock him up in a cage located under Eclesius' home. Keeping Samael's cage locked and in good shape is needed to "prevent the apocalypse", according to Eclesius who refers to him as a ''Demon Uberoverlord''.
Its name is confirmed by his fellow inmate [[A Confused Frog]] who describes Samael as an annoyed [[Demon Overlords|Demon Overlord]].
It is not possible to see Samael from any known place in Tibia, however it is possible to hear his screams from {{Mapper Coords|text=outside his cellar|126.37|126.37|9|8|1|0.1250.125}}, from {{Mapper Coords|text=this cave in Thais sewers|126.48|126.4|9|8|1|0.1250.125}} and from {{Mapper Coords|text=Thais prison|126.71|126.18|9|8|1|0.1250.125}}.
Although some players believe it might be possible to reach and face Samael, there is no sustainable evidence that points the devs ever intended to make it possible for players to reach Samael. Samael's Cellar.png|Samael is located after the bars inside the locked cellar, one map field to the east of what can be seen in this image Samael's Team Finder.png|Samael can be seen in the [[Social#Team Finder|Team Finder]]'s boss list
sounds: AAARRRRRRRR! YOU WILL PAY SO DEARLY FOR THIS!
ARE YOU INSANE TRYING TO TRAP ME HERE?!
I'M THE LORD OF ALL LORDS! LET ME OUT OF HERE!
THIS PUNY PRISON WILL NEVER HOLD ME!
WHEN I GET OUT OF HERE....
YOU CALLED ME, NOW YOU WILL TAKE RESPONSIBILITY.
YOU HAVE NO IDEA WHAT YOU'VE DONE.
history: With the implementation of the [[Bosstiary]] and the Daily Boosted Boss in the [[Summer Update 2022]] it was possible to confirm the appearance of Samael. The appearance has been leaked before on social media but the data from the new feature was the first official source for it.
name: Samael
